svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36" version="5.5.6.2" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 36px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 30px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div: time

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 288px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: - registers a Bonjour service on the local network (advertising his IP and port1)

switch.text: - registers a Bonjour service on the local network (advertising his IP and port1)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 208px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: - discovers and resolves Bob's service

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
partial hash of salted phone number
(includes salt, partialHash(phone_number, salt), numBitsRevealed)

switch.text:
partial hash of salted phone number
(includes salt, partialHash(phone_number, salt), numBitsRevealed)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 223px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: - checks own phone book against hash, and tries to guess Alice's phone number

switch.text: - checks own phone book against hash, and tries to guess Alice's phone number

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
JPAKE round 1 (where the shared secret
is Bob's guess for Alice's phone number)

switch.text:
JPAKE round 1 (where the shared secret
is Bob's guess for Alice's phone number)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div: JPAKE round 1

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div: JPAKE round 2

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div: JPAKE round 2

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div: JPAKE round 3

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div: JPAKE round 3

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 246px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: - derives high-entropy secret key K from JPAKE and stores it in a hash map - where keys are IP addresses (if JPAKE succeeded)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
ACK JPAKE round 3
(contains port2)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 158px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: - derives secret key K from JPAKE

switch.text: - derives secret key K from JPAKE

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 218px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.span: - establishes a TCP connection with Bob on port1

switch.text: - establishes a TCP connection with Bob on port1

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 284px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: - starts listening on port1 (for plaintext comms), and port2 (for AES encrypted comms)

switch.text: - starts listening on port1 (for plaintext comms), and port2 (for AES encrypted comms)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 178px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: - establishes a new TCP connection with Bob on port2, the old connection gets closed

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
TCP communication is now AES-CFB8-NoPadding encrypted
(with symmetric key K, and zero IV)

switch.text:
TCP communication is now AES-CFB8-NoPadding encrypted
(with symmetric key K, and zero IV)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
public key refresh
(includes public_key, timestamp, sign(hash(public_key, timestamp, phone_number)))

switch.text:
public key refresh
(includes public_key, timestamp, sign(hash(public_key, timestamp, phone_number)))

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 228px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
- after checking self-consistency of the message, checks whether he already knows other public keys for Alice's phone number
(if the self-consistency check fails, discards the message, and forcibly closes the TCP connection)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;
div.div:
- if no public keys are yet associated with the phone number,
Bob trusts Alice (trust on first use): accept message
- if this public key has previously been associated with the
phone number, we refresh the relevant time stamps: accept
- if another, different than this, public key is associated with
the phone number: discard the message, and forcibly close
the TCP connection

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 166px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: and now, the history transfer ...
